Worst, most toxic community can be found here that ever existed in any multiplayer game. Game is decent but by God, the hitbox system is atrocious, the unbalanced nature of the whole game is infuriating, and lets not start with the braindead random people you have the displeasur to play it with. It is supposed to be a team game, yet the random-guy-of-useless is self caring in the corner of the map (CCDN: Corner Claudette Doing Nothing), the other idiot is usually hiding in one of the lockers, and last but not least, the dicknugget, who immediately gives up on the first hook at the very beginning of the game, so that none of you stand a chance. Oh and thats just the survivor side of the game. Lets not start with the loads playing as killers, who are so useless f.cks that the only way they can play is to facecamp the sh1t out of you. F.ck this game and its whole community.
Oh and by the way: f.ck you and the life that you live, Behaviour. Especially when your borked servers keep disconnecting, but still i get the matchmaking locked, and get de-ranked. Oh and lets not talk about your broken a$$ events, and that it takes literally ages to find a match.  F.ck. You. You did a pretty good job so far, lol you clowns.

Update: 4/19/2021

After a few hundred hours of playing this game, I'm unfortunately changing my review to "No".   I no longer think this game deserves a positive review.  The game itself was really fun, but the higher and higher I get in ranks the more I hate this game.  Or rather, it's not the game that's the problem - it's the incredibly toxic community.  I'd say 3/4 killers in this game get their fun by tunneling survivors and doing everything in their power to be pieces of crap.  The survivors are often no better... Get ready for "You suck, you should uninstall", or "Wow you're garbage at this game, go kill yourself".  It's 4 survivors vs the killer, but sometimes the survivors will just decide to troll the team and help the killer.  They'll lead the killer to your hiding place, or run around to generators and then intentionally fail skill checks to ruin your progress and alert the killer.  What can you do about it? Nothing.  That's just the awesome toxic community of DBD.  It's doesn't matter if you are playing a P3 rank 50 survivor with the best possible perks, if people decide to be pieces of garbage and ruin your game... They absolutely can.  As you get higher in rank, you get more and more of that.  At some point it stops being fun and just becomes a marathon of frustration.  You could argue that it isn't the game's fault that the game community is toxic.  However, I disagree because there is no "player rating" system or anything done with the in-game reporting function.  They could take a few steps to better moderate the players so toxic trolls are penalized instead of being rewarded.  Based on how long this game has been around; it does not appear that the devs care about that at all.

You can report the toxic people all day long with in the in-game report system, but it does absolutely nothing.  They do have an official Discord server, but guess where all the toxic people hang out when they aren't in a game?  Yep, Discord.  Get ready for their lovely comments of "Clearly you suck at this game and should stop complaining".  Or it's the ever intelligent comment of "git gud".  It's too bad that a toxic community has ruined what was a really good game at first.

This game is good if you play it for fun.

Imho, there is no reason to even try to play it professionally, because gameplay is not balanced.
There are always new weird updates which shock everyone.
There are always new disgusting killers - i will never forgive devs about the Plague, it´s awful! Basically they just puked on players with the killer...
And the community is not that friendly as I´d like it to be.

Anyways!
This game is funny and it´s not that difficult to find good people here to play next match together.
Online in the game is pretty big so waiting for your lobby is not that long which is good.
There is no voice chat so you would never hear a r*tard screaming at you.

This game is good and bad at the same time, depends on what you expect and what you´re playing for.
If there was a neutral recommendation I would use it for sure.

Very Good game.

I do and did recommend this game to friends and anyone cos overall it's undeniably fun. You can play casually or every day, might have a good time, a bad one, but there's no reason not to return to it occasionally.

However, as you read this review, I don't know what game we might be talking about, cos these devs are quite nuts and they change things at random, and each time they unleash new bugs that are scarier than the killers themselves. And instead of fixing those bugs they spend time adding more and more characters that by now are less and less interesting and more disfunctional, with mostly useless Perks.

But these nutty devs also give you freebies like revised graphics and animations to keep the game up to date with current standards. Appreciated (except when those animations suck, but that's another topic).
So can't really hate the devs, quite the contrary. I just think they need to refocus their priorities and stop releasing killers and characters that frequently: guys, we have enough now! Can you work on balancing and improving...and removing some of the breakable doors you placed (depends when you read this review)?

On the other hand, players of this game largely suck. They are perennially pissed and frustrated and they will let you know. Go the forums and you see them arguing all day, faction vs faction. All you've heard about this community is true.
But if you can tolerate their shots of bile on your white shirt the game itself is alright, but again...I might not be talking about the same game you're playing.

bu oyun hem tek hem arkadaşlarınızla oynamak için yapılmış şahane bir oyun. Amaç şu şekilde;
1 katil 4 masum var katil bizi yakalayıp asmaya çalışıyor ilk asılışta şanslıysanız kaçabilirsiniz şansınıza güvenmiyorsanız o zaman kaçmaya çalışmayıp arkadaşlarınızı bekleyiniz, 2. asılışta space tuşuna bas çek yapmanız gerekiyor ve asılı kalma zamanınız yarısına kadar azalıyor kaçma şansınız arkadaşınızın sizi kurtarması ile olur. 3. asılışınızda oyun sizin için bitiyor. Masum olursanız kaçmak için 2 yol var ilk yol haritadaki jeneratörleri tamamlamanız (maptan mapa jeneratör sayısı değişiyor kaçmak için 5 tanesini bitirmeniz gerek) ya da sandıklardan (mapte farklı yerlerde çıkan sandıklardan loot olarak anahtar, sağlık çantası, jeneratör hızlı yapmak için ve asılma yerlerini kırmak için tamir çantası ) anahtar bulup oyunda çıkan kapaktan kaçabiliyorsunuz ama anahtarı bulmak zorken kapağı bulmak daha zordur. Oyunda katil mi yoksa masum mu olacağınızı belirliyebiliyorsunuz her karakterin (hem katil,hem masum) kendine göre özellikleri var. Oyunda kan puanı sistemi var oynadıkça ve kaçtıkça (katilseniz adam öldürdükçe) karakterinizi seviye atlatarak daha fazla özellik kullanıyorsunuz. ilk denediğimizde katil oyun bulma süresi fazla sürüyor ben arkadaşımla oynadığım için masum olarak giriyoruz oyun çok eğlenceli. söylemeyi unutmuşum 5 arkadaşınız ile özel lobi oluşturup 1 katil 4 masum şeklinde kendi aranızda oynayabilirsiniz iyi oyunlar
